titleStmt.title: Gods rebuke in taking from vs that worthy and honourable gentleman Sir Edward Lewkenor Knight, the first day of May this present yeere 1618, he being at that time high Sheriffe of Suffolke whose Christian life and comfortable end are here faithfully recorded. Together with diuers profitable and necessarie instructions; deliuered first in a discourse at his funerall, and now inlarged, and published, for the benefit of others not then present. By T.O. aliàs P. minister of the word of God at Denham in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Oldmayne, Timothy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin for Iohn Parker at the signe of the Ball in Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Timoth: Oldmayne, aliàs Pricke.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Ball in Pauls-Church-yard
